text: Nadhim Shaker Salim (; 18 December 1958 â€“ 11 September 2020) was an Iraqi football player and manager. He played for the national team between 1978 and 1986. He was born in Baghdad. His playing career lasted from 1976 to 1988. Shaker died on 11 September 2020 at a hospital in Erbil from COVID-19, aged 61. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Baghdad Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Iraq
title: Nadhim Shaker
